fulltext:
Product Manager - Engineering Team Lead
NAM DAU
//  CAREER OJECTIVE
As a tech-savvy product manager, I am seeking opportunities to work in a 
professional and fast-growing environment where I can utilize my skills and 
put my maximum effort into building and shipping cutting-edge quality 
products that help solving real-world problems.
//   CONTACT
Mobile
+84 901 380 659
Email namdq.nu@gmail.com
Skype n_uuuuuuuu
Linkedin https://www.linkedin.com/in/namdq
Github https://github.com/namdau
//  PERSONAL SUMMARY
I have been producing and deploying web-based and mobile applications for 
more than 8 years.
I'm currently leading a team of talented engineers, designers and testers to 
help building an exclusive tech talents platform in Vietnam.
I have relevant experience of building up and maintaining engineering teams.
I'm obsessed with process and workflow optimizations.
I admire open-minded people and healthy working environments where 
everyone should be encouraged to express their ideas and contribute as a 
team.
//  TECH SKILLS
PHP, Javacript, TypeScript, 
ES2015-2018, Nodejs, Python
Symfony, Laravel, Django, Wordpress, 
Vuejs, Reactjs
HTML5, SASS, Pug, Stylus, PostCSS, 
Webpack, Babel, PWA
MySQL, Postgres, Redis, MongoDB, 
Firebase
AWS services: S3, Elastic Beanstalk, 
EC2, Route5, Cloudfront, VPC, RDS, 
Elastic Cache, Elastic Container 
Service, Elastic Search
Docker, GitlabCI, CirleCI, Jenkins, 
Ubuntu, CentOS
Automation testing: Selenium, 
Cypress, Puppeteer
//   SPECIALITIES
Manage the complete SDLC for software projects
Experience in designing and building up RESTful web services, API, 
websites, portals, CMS
Build up and maintain sustainable engineering team, provide mentorship 
in career path development, as well as resolve conflicts and conduct 
performance reviews.
Design and setup assessment framework for hunting, hiring and 
nurturing tech talents.
Work with non-technical and management teams to clarify product 
scopes, vision and business goals
Software design patterns, OOP, SOLID, best security pratices
Agile team management using Scrum and Kanban
//   TOOLS
Editor: VS Code, Sublime Text, 
PHPStorm, Vim, iTerm2
Project management: Jira, Confluence, 
PivotalTracker, Google Apps, Redmine
SCM: Github, self-hosted Gitlab 
Communication: Google Apps, Slack, 
Error monitoring: Sentry
Wireframing: Sketch, InvisionApp, 
Balsamiq, Userflow, Marvelapp
Pencil & paper
//  EXPERIENCES
02/2018 - Current
Saigon
Product Manager
Pangara AB
Oversee product development and run the engineering 
team in Vietnam, responsibles include:
Define product scope, roadmap and release plans
Recruit and mentor development team members
Work with designers to create product design system
Typical product management activites: sprint planning and 
reviewing, wireframing, code reviewing, release demo
Provide technical strategy for measuring sales and 
marketing efforts
Provide technical consultancy and help creating materials 
for setting up assessment solution to qualify freelace 
developers, as part of the company's business model
Co-organise the first Vuejs Vietnam Meetup as I'm of the 
founding member of the community in Vietnam
Pangara AB
09/2016 - 01/2018
Saigon
Technical Lead
Join as the first product team member and has been in charge 
of it ever since.
Manage development team
Assess and make decisions on technical choices
Participate in recruiting and interviewing freelance 
developers
Etablish product developement strategy and setup CI/CD 
workflow
Held code review sessions and workshops for improving 
quality and productivity
Construct Digital
12/2015 - 08/2016
Saigon
Tech Lead cum Chief Representative
Responsible for the production team in Vietnam, take part in 
client consulting as well as project estimation, provide 
technical guidance and training on a daily basis. Featured 
projects:
Gain City: develop and maintain the ecommerce website 
for Gain City – one of the biggest electronic devices 
retailers in Singapore
https://www.gaincity.com
Tupperware: develop and maintain the CMS and API 
that built on top of Django for Tupperware Brands 
mobile apps, which has been deployed on Singapore, 
Malaysia, Indonesia and Philippines markets.
Lamitak: rebuild the website for a laminates 
manufacturer.
https://www.lamitak.com
//  EXPERIENCES
11/2013 - 11/2015
Singapore
Senior Web Developer
Construct Digital
As a member of production team, I work accross multiple 
client's projects various in different categories: CMS, marketing 
tool, CRM, micro-sites, landing pages. I'm also assigned to 
serveral UX and performance optimization cases. Featured 
projects:
IKEA - Experience the power of a bookbook™: an Apple-
parody campaign, which instantly went viral on YouTube 
and got featured on Time, Telegraph, Mashable, 
TodayOnline, as well as a bunch of other magazines.
Shinyoen: a worldwide e-learning management system for 
an international Buddhist organisation that serves 
customers in many locations (Singapore, Taiwan, Japan)
CoastCyles: online store for an outdoor gears manufacturer, 
building everything from scratch
Student Connect: a career platform for young professional 
in Singapore, Hong Kong and Indonesia.
08/2011 - 08/2013
Da Nang
Co-founder Revo21
Co-create and operate a start-up provides an advanced 
publishing platform to help authors, publishers, designers and 
artists deliver their works to the readers like never before by 
turning the content into interactive apps that run on mobile 
devices.
09/2010 - 06/2011
Saigon
Associate Software Engineer
CSC (now DXC Technology)
Start my career as an Associate Software Engineer (got 
promoted to Software Engineer before I left). I work mostly 
with Java technologies, participate in implementation and 
maintainance activites for client's projects using Spring, 
Hibernate, Struts and Oracle.
//  EDUCATION
Vietnam National University HCMC- International University
Bachelor of Engineering, Computer Science
https://hcmiu.edu.vn
//  OPEN SOURCE
A core member of the official Vuejs Vietnam group
https://github.com/orgs/vuejs-vn/people
Co-organise and give a speak at the first Vuejs Vietnam meetup
https://www.meetup.com/vuejs-vietnam/events/247572268/

educations.school: Vietnam National University HCMC - International University
educations.major_categories: Máy tính và công nghệ thông tin
